name: forge-desktop
description: The tool every software developer wished they had.

scripts.start: concurrently "BROWSER=none yarn run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.start:win: concurrently "SET BROWSER=none&&yarn run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.ship: yarn run clean && yarn run build:react && yarn run build:electron --mac --linux --win --publish=always
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:react && yarn run build:electron
scripts.build:test: yarn run clean && yarn run build:react && yarn run build:electron --dir
